title: Bug 108822 - More logical processing of disk sorting needed for border row values
OB: When sorting data on disk, if there are 40000 rows of data and the program is configured to process the data less than 40000 rows, the following operations are performed:
EB: Bug 108822 - More logical processing of disk sorting needed for border row values. Currently, the program simply copies the file to the destination folder. A better approach would be to sort the data directly in memory and then write it to the file.
